item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, I’m Enya. I’m a third-year Computer Science and Piano Performance student. In addition to my in-major topics, I’m also interested in languages and mathematics. Contact Me Email: cdo1@tutanota.com Mastodon: @enya@noc.social Keys PGP Key
